content:
Wanted to report that Rust Forge is down:

500 ERROR
The request could not be satisfied.
The Lambda@Edge service is currently experiencing problems. We can't connect to the server for this app or website at this time. There might be too much traffic or a configuration error. Try again later, or contact the app or website owner.
